text: «Write code like a violent psychopath who knows where you live»
author: Steve McConnell

text: «The complexity of the program develops until it exceeds the ability of the programmer»
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's Laws

text: «Walking on water and pieces of the program, following the ToR, is very easy... if they are frozen»
author: I. Berard

text: «The smarter a person is, the more easily he admits he's a fool»
author: Albert Einstein

text: «Those who do nothing never make mistakes.»
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: «Least of all are people who want to become Kazakhstanis»
author: Leo Tolstoy

text: «We have found our contribution to this world. Otherwise, why are we here?»
author: Steve Jobs

text: «My way of joking is to tell the truth. There's nothing funny in the world»
author: Bernard Shaw

text: «I drink to make people around me more interesting»
author: Ernest Hemingway
